price: 55. Diggah woo ayró Jannatti mari ruffu edde iyyan niqmatat agxitan.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
